DataElement.preferredName: Pharmacodynamic Study Post Five Hour Infusion Procedure Collection Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of gathering a pharmacodynamic study sample five hours after the termination point of an infusion procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pharmacodynamic Study Post Five Hour Infusion Procedure Collection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the act of gathering a pharmacodynamic study sample five hours after the termination point of an infusion procedure (a method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A study of the biochemical and physiological effect of a drug and the mechanism of drug action and the relationship between drug concentration and effect.

Concepts.definition: A study of the biochemical and physiological effect of a drug and the mechanism of drug action and the relationship between drug concentration and effect.

Property.preferredName: Post Five Hour Infusion Procedure Collection
Property.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.:In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream. Also called intravenous infusion.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
